area: forest for the lost is a dense dark oak forest allways covered in fog. no light ever touches the ground and the distance seems unreachable

room: at the end of the forest for the lost, light is now visible as the trees clear and a path can now be seen running along the grass twords a town
characters: i see you've come out of the forest, not many dare to enter the forest for the lost
my name is pag, but my friends like to call me old man pag
